longBusinessSummary: Advani Hotels & Resorts (India) Limited engages in the hotel business in India. It owns and operates the Caravela Beach Resort, a five-star Deluxe Resort situated in South Goa. The company was formerly known as Ramada Hotels (India) Limited and changed its name to Advani Hotels & Resorts (India) Limited in 1999. Advani Hotels & Resorts (India) Limited was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Mumbai, India.
